Title: The Happy Place
Plot: A hypnotist bank robber becomes the prime suspect in a murder investigation.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Glenne Headly, Sam Murphy, Bruno Campos, Gabriel Casseus, Bruce Weitz, Kristin Dattilo, Ivar Brogger, Ryan Doom, Ntare Guma, Mbaho Mwine, Aldis Hodge, Archie Kao, Geoffrey Rivas, Larry Sullivan, Nicole Vicius, Lina
